## charRange() function

Yields iterator of characters \[`from`<!-- -->..`to`<!-- -->\] (inclusive). Uses reverse ordering if `to` &lt; `from`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function charRange(from: string | number, to: string | number): Generator<string, void, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | <code>string &#124; number</code> |  |
|  to | <code>string &#124; number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<string, void, unknown>`
